attributes.additional_details: We Are Trying To Stop Deforestation For Good! So We Can Stop Global Warming So The Planet Will Not Be Destroyed. If You Are A Supporter Please Put Your Signature In So It Can Help Get Noticed.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also want to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254607

We can't accept petitions without a full name. If you do want to submit a new petition, please include this with your submission.
